definition: coda/epilogue/end
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
sound/voice/tone/noise/reputation/classifier for sounds

sentences.english: What do you do, then, if you happen to end up with the wrong trill note at the end?
sentences.chinese: 那么，如果你在临近尾声时弹错了颤音上，该怎么办？

sentences.english: At the close of World War II, Acheson was serving as Under Secretary of State.
sentences.chinese: 在二战接近尾声时，艾奇逊担任副国务卿。

sentences.english: And now this fateful interview had come to a close.
sentences.chinese: 这次命运恢关的会见此时已接近尾声。

sentences.english: By the time of the inquest, the wildfowl season was at an end.
sentences.chinese: 在那次调查开始时，到了打猎季节的尾声。

sentences.english: The sky is still booming. However, the storm is drawing to the end.
sentences.chinese: 天空还正在隆隆作响，而这场暴雨已近尾声。

sentences.english: Eventually, one person is the winner by the end of the season.
sentences.chinese: 最后，该季节目到尾声会淘汰到剩下一位获胜者。

sentences.english: Our Mongolian adventure was drawing to a close.
sentences.chinese: 至此，我们的蒙古冒险之旅渐近尾声。

sentences.english: It's coming to an end the moment my interest has just aroused.
sentences.chinese: 兴趣刚被激发起来，比赛就接近尾声了。

sentences.english: The long cruel winter came to an end at last, yielding to a gentle warm.
sentences.chinese: 漫长的严冬终于接近尾声，被柔和温暖的气候所取代。

sentences.english: THE summer dry-season, now drawing to an end, is when the Amazon rainforest gets cut and burned.
sentences.chinese: 干燥的夏季现在已经接近尾声。

sentences.english: Picking is nearing completion in Zimbabwe and seed cotton deliveries are slowing.
sentences.chinese: 津巴布韦新花采摘接近尾声，籽棉收购缓慢。

sentences.english: Has the great oil rally of 2011 run its course?
sentences.chinese: 2011年的油价大涨之势已近尾声？

sentences.english: All of this arrives just as the launch day for health reform draws near.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些到一天就像发射卫生改革已近尾声。

sentences.english: The dancer's breathing quickened as she approached the end of her solo.
sentences.chinese: 舞蹈家在接近她独舞的尾声时呼吸变得急速了。

sentences.english: The fight afterward for Nanking was practically the epilogue of Songhu campaign.
sentences.chinese: 其后的南京保卫战实际上是淞沪之战的尾声。

sentences.english: Now the star-making fun isbeginning to end.
sentences.chinese: 现在造星游戏正接近尾声。

definition: close to/approaching
stage/section/phase/period/CL:個|个[ge4]
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
final part of a go game (see 官子[guan1 zi3])/endgame/to finish up/to come to the final stage
termination/to finish/to end/to conclude/to close
to be about to arrive/to be around the corner
to come to the end of a phase (idiom)
to approach/to come closer
final period/the end (of a term)/the close
to turn white-hot/to intensify/to reach a climax
imminent
to step into/to enter
over fifty percent/more than half
to count down/countdown
the curtain drops/the end of the show
ready to start on sth/about to act
